title: Lesson 03 - One Minute Irish
description: In lesson 3 of One Minute Irish you will learn how to say that you speak a little Irish. Remember - even a few phrases of a language can help you make friends and enjoy travel more. Find out more about One Minute Irish at our website - http://www.oneminutelanguages.com
